pr_title: Update preview to use Table components instead of Grid

timeline.bodyText: Do these colors give enough contrast for readability?
timeline.author: njbriggs

replies.bodyText: Looks like it might be an issue: https://webaim.org/resources/contrastchecker/?fcolor=FFFFFF&bcolor=BBBBBB We want at least 4.5:1 for small text.
replies.author: njbriggs

replies.bodyText:
Good call, and thank you for including the link! I've created a JIRA for this: https://issues.cask.co/browse/CDAP-17304
It might make sense to include checking/improving contrast be part of the component library efforts. I suspect there are a few other components that use the same styling for headers besides in Preview and in the Plugin documentation table.
replies.author: yukiej
